forms.name: Create Well
forms.purpose: Creates new HJ Wells records and sets operator/deal IDs consumed by WF-04.

forms.name: Associate Existing Wells
forms.purpose: Captures lists of existing wells to link to a sales deal through WF-05.

modules.name: hjp-create-associate-well.module
modules.purpose: Launches the Create Well form, prepopulating operator/deal context from WF-03 output.

modules.name: hjp-created-well.module
modules.purpose: Displays confirmation and next steps after wells are created/associated.

workflows.name: 04. Associate Created Well to Sales Deal
workflows.purpose: Links newly created well to operator company (type 126) and sales deal (type 128).

workflows.name: 05. Associate Existing Wells to Sales Deal
workflows.purpose: Iterates through well IDs collected on the contact form to create deal â†” well associations.
